title: Fast
effect: May be used twice in a round at -1 Effect each.

title: Wide
effect: Affects an additional target in the same zone.

title: Burning
effect: Inflicts 1 Burning per attack or defend action.

title: Freezing
effect: Inflicts 1 Freezing per attack or defend action.

title: Insulating
effect: Protects from 1 Freezing or 1 Burning per defend action.

title: Enerving
effect: Inflicts 1 Distress per attack or defend action.

title: Penetrating
effect: Ignores 1 Injury reduction / atk. or inflicts 1 Injury / def. action.

title: Permanent
effect: Remains in play, cannot be discarded by normal means.

title: Dangerous
effect: On action, +1 Effect and suffer 1 Injury.

title: Pushing
effect: On action, move target to an adjacent zone.

title: Pulling
effect: On action, move target to your zone.

title: Area
effect: Affects all targets in the zone.
